full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DZAM BHA LA DKAR PO'I 'BUL BA'I GSHEGS GTOR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,('DIR DZAMBHA LA DKAR PO LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BKRA SHIS @004B CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI GRVA TSANG GI CHOS RJE DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB AER TE NI HAS NANG GSO, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DBUL PHONGS SDUG BSNGAL SEL BA'I PHYIR DU, ^RNAM GA-YENG GI MKHAS BOD CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO,, ,,)
